name: Logging Truck Driving
description:
Logging Truck Driving!!!
Drive monster heavy trucks to test offroad driving skills in pro truck driver simulator game. Explore tricky terrain as an off-road truck driver on steep, curvy and dangerous roads. Drive for unlimited hours as a real trucker and explore big 3D open world
Features:
* Best real cargo truck simulator 3D of Truck games.
* Real experience of driving heavy wood transporter in this transport truck game.
* Explore the various environments in the truck simulator 3D mania.
* Complete all exciting levels of big transporter driving
